Package org.drasyl.peer.connection.client

Class DirectClient

java.lang.Object
org.drasyl.peer.connection.client.DirectClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, DrasylNodeComponent
public class DirectClient extends Object
Used by DirectConnectionsManager to establish a direct connection to another peer.
